Articles.Content:
I\'ve been around a couple of weeks, but I never posted a hello here...getting lazy, I suppose.

I\'ve already made a few simple .cfg edits and posted a couple of 'how to\'s' so a few of you have already said 'hi'. For those I haven\'t met, Hello!, glad to meet you.

I love the game and think it has a huge potential, the development staff is obviously quite talented. I haven\'t coded anything since 1986, so I probably won\'t be much help to the community, but I\'ll contribute when I can.

See you all around the forum, and happy crater making!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello! 8)

Welcome to the forums!

An as Capt\'n Skunky said: Happy launchings!
